name: Deep Space (itch) (StevenChiefo)
description:
Title: Deep Space

Genre: Third Person Shooter

Platforms: Windows, (PS , XBOX : COMING)

Inspiration:

This is my own passion project in Unreal engine. This game was based/Inspired by Death Space, Halo, Mass Effect.

Lore:

You're on a ship broken down, and abandoned from all life. But because of a weird glitch in the system, you have been released from your pod, to find that everyone you meet on the ship has turned into a hostile creature. The people that put you there are now aware of what's happening and are coming to finish what they started.

Controls -

-Keyboard

 Movement = W A S D

 Aim = Right Mouse button

 Shoot = Left Mouse Button

 Melee = V

 Reload = R

Interact = E

Sprint = Left Shift

-Controller

 Movement = Left Thumb Stick

 Aim = Left Trigger

 Shoot = Right Trigger

Melee = Right Shoulder button

Reload = North button

Interact = West button

 Sprint = Hold Right Thumb Stick
